name: Isithairwashingday
0:
”Alexa, ask allison's brain when is hair washing day”
”Alexa, tell allison's brain i washed my hair today”
”Alexa, tell allison's brain to change my hair washing schedule to every 3 days”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: allison's brain
des: If you wash your hair every 2 days, it can be hard to remember when's hair washing day. This skill helps remind you when you last washed your hair and when the next time you should wash your hair is.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
